description:
Chiya tells Chino that there used to be a deep rivalry between the owners of Ama Usa An and Rabbit House, so all of the girls decide to find out whether that`s true. Chino takes advantage of a middle school job experience project to work at Ama Usa An for three days and investigate both shops` pasts along with Chiya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kedama wa Tokkoushi Mujihi na Button wa Hanatareru
The Furball Launches a Suicide Attack and a Cruel Button Is Fired
毛玉は特攻し無慈悲なボタンは放たれる
